post_message: INSPIRING ACT OF KINDNESS: A woman says she was at the coffee shop with her 22-month-old child when two women behind her in line started making mean, hushed comments about her looks. Rather than returning hate with hate, the woman decided to be a role model for her child and show the women kindness.
